artist: Wenceslaus Hollar; Aftera follower of Hans Holbein the Younger
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: small group of men at R carry weapons and one man raises a burning candle over Christ, who walks toward R, with back turned away from viewer; man crawling at LL; two men serve a man seated on a throne in back; crucifix stands at R edge
marks:
Inscription

inscribed in plate at bottom: [See
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Pilate Washing His Hands
